column1: Bures-sur-Yvette is a commune in the Essonne department in Île-de-France in northern France.
Inhabitants of Bures-sur-Yvette are known as Buressois.
Bures-sur-Yvette is located in the Vallée de Chevreuse on the river Yvette
column2: along which the RER line B is laid. The stations on the line serving the commune are Bures-sur-Yvette and La Hacquinière. Adjacent communes are Orsay
column5: and Les Ulis. The small town is also twinned with Crewkerne UK.

column1: Bures-sur-Yvette hosts the greater part of the Orsay campus of the University of Paris-Sud (Paris XI)
column2: as well as the Institut des Hautes Études Scientifiques (IHÉS).
